title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel Issue
body: i keep getting the PVP.net patcher kernel has stopped working every time i try to launch. I've uninstalled and re installed and keep getting the same error. Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: It would seem that if you make sure to run the program as an administrator it works.

> [{quoted}](name=Red Destin,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pqtcMsWE,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2014-09-30T00:08:20.952+0000)
>
> Worked for me. Thanks.

lol is aNY BODY else gett he servrer busy  sign? its rather annoying me ive reset the comp and  router
This worked for me. Thanks for posting this. Here, have a {{item:2010}} .

Hi HogWild2016,

The step of running as administrator is the most common way to resolve this issue.  However, if you are still unable to get the game to run normally, despite this step, make sure to check out this guide:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/28732434-Patching-Issues

It has some extremely common solutions that should resolve this error!  There are quite a lot, but make sure that you try every single one as it may help!  If nothing else seems to work and your slamming your head on the desk, don't give yourself any further headaches!  Make sure to [send a new request](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) to us here in Player Support and we should be able to help!  Just make sure to include these logs if you do:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3

> 
> https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/28732434-Patching-Issues
> 

 Having the same issue, and this link no longer works. This has been going on for several weeks, and normally it's 3-5 times and I can connect. Tonight it's 25+ and still no dice. I've tried changing my DNS settings, running as admin, etc. No luck.

Here is the new link to the Patcher Issues KB Article!

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues

The steps there should hopefully resolve your issue.  If it doesn't, make sure to[ send in a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)so our Tech guru's can help out!

I found that happens sometimes, it happened when I opened task manager that there were several lolclients open, so make sure you dont have any open. Either that or do what SM4CK said and make sure you run lolclient as administrator. :)

Ritaldo
